q1.question: How do I sign up?
q1.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button at the top to register as Staff or Admin. Admin registration requires operator approval.

q2.question: I forgot my password.
q2.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page to receive a reset link via email.

q1.question: How do I apply for job postings?
q1.answer: Browse the Job Board, click on desired postings, and click the 'Apply' button to submit your application.

q1.question: When will I receive payment?
q1.answer: Payment is typically processed after work completion and admin approval. Contact your administrator for specific details.

q1.question: How do I check attendance?
q1.answer: Use the Attendance page to scan QR codes or have an administrator manually record your attendance.

account.title: Account Management
account.description: Delete your account and all associated data

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all data

warning.title: ⚠️ Warning
warning.message: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
warning.effects: Once you delete your account, the following will happen:
warning.effect1: • All personal information will be permanently deleted
warning.effect2: • All application and work history will be deleted
warning.effect3: • All payroll information will be deleted
warning.effect4: • You will not be able to use this account again

gracePeriod.title: 30-Day Grace Period
gracePeriod.description: After requesting deletion, you have 30 days to cancel. Your account will be deactivated during this period.
gracePeriod.deactivated: Your account is currently deactivated and scheduled for deletion.
gracePeriod.canReactivate: You can cancel the deletion request and reactivate your account anytime within 30 days.

modal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
modal.subtitle: This action cannot be undone
modal.feedbackPlaceholder: Please share any feedback to help us improve (max 500 characters)
modal.passwordPlaceholder: Enter your password to confirm deletion
modal.confirmCheckbox: I understand that this action cannot be undone and all my data will be permanently deleted.

errors.passwordRequired: Please enter your password to confirm.

modal.success: Account deletion requested. Your account will be deleted in 30 days.

pending.title: Account Deletion Pending
pending.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the account deletion request?
pending.cancelSuccess: Account deletion request cancelled successfully. Your account has been reactivated.
pending.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel account deletion request.
